summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Graham Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Dearborn Street to Rainier Avenue, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 33453 in the office of the City Clerk of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
